getting-started/account-setup.title: Account Setup
getting-started/account-setup.description: Better Meeting Rooms is currently distributed via TestFlight, and new users must follow the onboarding process below.

getting-started/system-requirements.title: System Requirements
getting-started/system-requirements.description: To get the most out of the Better Meeting Rooms solution, your device must meet the following system requirements.

intro.title: Welcome to Better Meeting Rooms
intro.description: Better Meeting Rooms helps you optimize your meeting spaces for enhanced collaboration, productivity, and comfort.

lifecycle/deployment/index.title: Deployment Phase
lifecycle/deployment/index.description: The Deployment Phase is where approved designs turn into real meeting rooms.

lifecycle/design/index.title: Design Phase
lifecycle/design/index.description: The Design Phase turns room data into a proposed setup ready for deployment.

lifecycle/discovery/index.title: Discovery Phase
lifecycle/discovery/index.description: The Discovery Phase is the first and most important step in the Better Meeting Rooms lifecycle.

lifecycle/maintenance/index.title: Maintenance Phase
lifecycle/maintenance/index.description: The Maintenance Phase ensures that rooms remain effective and reliable after deployment.

recommendations/index.title: Recommendations
recommendations/index.description: This section contains practical recommendations to get reliable results during Discovery and beyond.

recommendations/speakers-for-acoustics.title: Speakers for acoustics
recommendations/speakers-for-acoustics.description: Below are portable speakers we have tested and verified for BMR‚Äôs Acoustic Measurements .

release-notes/2025-08-beta-release-02.description: The latest update to the Better Meeting Rooms solution brings powerful enhancements to search, libraries, and room management.

release-notes/2025-09-beta-release-03.title: September 2025 ‚Äì Beta Release 03
